text: Barnstaple is a town in Devon, a county in South West England. 20,724 people live there. It is found west southwest of Bristol, north of Plymouth and northwest of the county town of Exeter. == References == == Other websites == * * Barnstaple Town Council and Town Centre Management * North Devon District Council * Barnstaple Webcam (from Civic Centre) * Barnstaple's History * Museum of Barnstaple & North Devon * State of Devon's economy 2006 * Pannier Market's History Category:Towns in Devon
title: Barnstaple
